name: Not Punched Report
query:
SELECT
    `tabEmployee`.name as "Employee Id:Link/Employee:120",
    `tabEmployee`.employee_name as "Employee Id:Link/Employee:120",
    `tabAttendance`.name as "Attendance Id:Link/Attendance:120",
    `tabAttendance`.attendance_date as "Date::120",
    `tabAttendance`.in_time as "In Time::120",
    `tabAttendance`.out_time as "Out Time::120",
    `tabAttendance`.status as "Status::120"		
FROM
     `tabEmployee`
     STRAIGHT JOIN `tabAttendance` ON `tabAttendance`.employee=`tabEmployee`.name            
WHERE
     `tabAttendance`.attendance_date = CURDATE()
ORDER BY
	`tabAttendance`.attendance_date asc
